name: Two step breast shaping
description: Not a full pattern, rather the recipe and inspiration for working an usual breast shaping to better fit no ease or negative ease tops. The recipe is calculated based on the EPS, but it can be modified to fit seamed garmens. No attempt at making it into a top-down solution, though.
full_text: Not a full pattern, rather the recipe and inspiration for working an usual breast shaping to better fit no ease or negative ease tops. The recipe is calculated based on the EPS, but it can be modified to fit seamed garmens. No attempt at making it into a top-down solution, though.
